metadata.title: CVE-2020-13902 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ImageMagick 7.0.9-27 through 7.0.10-17 has a heap-based buffer over-read inBlobToStringInfo in MagickCore/string.c during TIFF image decoding.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
